I like it, but i think if you make one of the ninjas a headhunter skin, you should make one for all ow them, i'm not sure how {{champion:98}}'s or {{champion:85}}'s one would look, but being a {{champion:238}} main, i would love to see a headhunter skin for him.

suggestion for this Akali skin: There be a counter for how many kills she gets (headhunts) that if you select her it tells your enemies and allies how much of maddog you are.
